TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentRenameEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks A ComponentRenameEventArgs provides data about a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename> event.
A ComponentRenameEventArgs object provides the following information:
- A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs.Component%2A> property that references the component being renamed.
- An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs.OldName%2A> property that indicates the old name of the component.
- A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs.NewName%2A> property that indicates the new name of the component.
## Examples The following example demonstrates creating a ComponentRenameEventArgs.
[!code-cpp[ComponentRenameEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.componentmodel._33_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[ComponentRenameEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._33_1.cs)] [!code-vb[ComponentRenameEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._33_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: public ComponentRenameEventArgs (object component, string oldName, string newName);

Gets the component that is being renamed.
Docs.value: The component that is being renamed.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the component after the rename event.
Docs.value: The name of the component after the rename event.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the component before the rename event.
Docs.value: The previous name of the component.
